    Author:
    Christian Bauer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatagramIOConfigurationImpl()
      Defaults to TTL of '4' and maximum datagram size of 640 bytes (512 per UDA 1.0, 128 byte header).
